resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet
A.1 Chirag Bargoojar and Dhruv Maindola build this app using Kotlin+Java and it takes us 6 weeks to learn and 2-3 weeks to build this app from scratch.
A.2 The purpose of this app to put our learned knowledge towards an app which helps both of us to achieve our goal to become android app developers.
A.4 Dhruv Maindola build all the XML/UI layout and design the app cause he is very creative while Chirag Bargoojar build the backend working of app and work on creating good user experience
A.3 We get the idea while we are ordering our food from Zomato. We both came to know that its really easy to build apps like this so we started learning.
A.5 There are 7 activities, 4 adapter classes,20-21 XML layouts(UI), 3 database files and 2 interfaces for database, 6 fragments and some other files for validation check and internet connection.

A.6 We add in-build feature in android for connecting to internet that is ConnectionManager class which is used to connect and check if internet is working. And about data, data is coming from an open source API(Application programming interface) which have the name of restaurant and menu of restaurant.
